Package fr.sandro642.github.misc

Class LangManager

java.lang.Object
fr.sandro642.github.misc.LangManager
public class LangManager extends Object
LangManager handles loading and retrieving language messages from .lang files with placeholder support.

  • Constructor Details

    • LangManager

      public LangManager()
      LangManager constructor. Automatically loads the language file configured in ConnectLib.

  • Method Details

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage(String category, String messagePath, String... arguments)
      Retrieves a translated message with argument replacement (varargs version). Arguments are passed as pairs: placeholder_name, value
      Parameters:
      category - The message category (e.g., "connectlib.class")
      messagePath - The message path (e.g., "initialise.catcherror")
      arguments - Arguments to replace in the message (e.g., "exception", "NullPointerException")
      Returns:
      The formatted message with replaced arguments 
       getMessage("connectlib.class", "initialise.catcherror", "exception", "NullPointerException")

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage(String category, String messagePath, Map<String,String> arguments)
      Retrieves a translated message with argument replacement (Map version).
      Parameters:
      category - The message category (e.g., "connectlib.class")
      messagePath - The message path (e.g., "initialise.catcherror")
      arguments - Map containing key-value pairs to replace placeholders
      Returns:
      The formatted message with replaced arguments 
       Map<String, String> args = new HashMap<>();
 args.put("exception", "NullPointerException");
 getMessage("connectlib.class", "initialise.catcherror", args)

 // Or with Map.of() (Java 9+)
 getMessage("connectlib.class", "initialise.catcherror", Map.of("exception", "NullPointerException"))

    • isLoadedSuccessfully

      public boolean isLoadedSuccessfully()
      Checks if the language file was loaded successfully.
      Returns:
      true if loading succeeded, false otherwise

    • getLoadError

      public String getLoadError()
      Returns the loading error if there is one.
      Returns:
      The error message or null if no error

    • hasCategory

      public boolean hasCategory(String category)
      Checks if a category exists in the language file.
      Parameters:
      category - The category name to check
      Returns:
      true if the category exists, false otherwise

    • hasMessage

      public boolean hasMessage(String category, String messagePath)
      Checks if a message exists in a category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category name
      messagePath - The message path in the category
      Returns:
      true if the message exists, false otherwise

    • getCategories

      public Set<String> getCategories()
      Retrieves all available categories.
      Returns:
      A Set containing all category names

    • getMessagesInCategory

      public Map<String,String> getMessagesInCategory(String category)
      Retrieves all messages from a category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category name
      Returns:
      A Map containing all messages in the category, or null if the category doesn't exist
